long_description: Made for adventure travelers and minimalist backpackers, the Bug Hut Pro 1 is a tentlike mini-shelter that protects against flying insects-and now it offers extra protection from those critters. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Gear repels mosquitoes, ticks, flies, and fleas. Invisible built-in Insect Shield(R) repellent remains effective through 6 months of exposure to weathering or through 25 launderings for washable items; do not dry clean. Bug Hut fits completely over sleeping bag with a pole-supported canopy over your upper body allowing bug-free stargazing. Slit opening on bottom keeps foot of sleeping bag enclosed in mesh. Includes 2 aluminum stakes and pole and stake bags. No special care or storage required.
short_description: Made for adventure travelers and minimalist backpackers, the Bug Hut Pro 1 is a tentlike mini-shelter that protects against flying insects-and now it offers extra protection from those critters.
